New Records: Tyler Herro set a franchise record with his 70th consecutive game with at least one made three-pointer
Key Match Events: Jaime Jaquez Jr. scored five crucial points in the final 1:03
Walker Kessler successfully challenged a foul call but lost the ensuing jump ball, leading to a Jaquez three-pointer
Pre-Game Insights: The Jazz had injuries to key players including Jordan Clarkson (foot), John Collins (hip), Keyonte George (heel), and Brice Sensabaugh
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz had lost their ninth consecutive home game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat outscored the Jazz 17-7 in fast-break points
Others: The Heat improved to 19-17, while the Jazz remained the league's worst team at protecting the ball
